title: FS: T205 Eddie Collins Both Variations!!!
author: Nappy1525

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Eddie Collins Both Variations!!!
posts.post_content: Hey everyone trying to sell another two cards for a great price in my set sadly. These are two beautiful cards and both pretty decent grades. Eddie Collins Mouth OPENED is Sgc 40. And Eddie Collins Mouth CLOSED is Beckett 2.5. I am selling them as a double so the price listed is the price for both cards. If you have any questions pm me and I will quickly answer. Paypal family only please. Looking to get $Sold for both. First ones to say I"ll take it" gets them.
